select shipments_boxes_lines.id,
shipments_boxes_lines.ref_box, shipments_boxes_lines.ref_invoice_line, shipments_boxes_lines.quantity, shipments_boxes_lines.net_weight, shipments_boxes_lines.gross_weight,
